info.name: Google meets - Custom Background
info.description:
Makes the google meets background a custom background of your choice (default is sky blue). 

Choose a color or image by clicking the "customise settings" button next to the install button.

Image can be selected via url or desktop upload.
info.additionalInfo:
V2 - Added option to choose your own background image. (01/01/2022)
V1.1 - Added option to choose your own color. (21/07/2021)
